titles.title: In Goodness Givest Thou (familiar tune easy)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In goodness givest Thou In goodness takest Who know Thy heart O God can trust Thy hand Wisely the vase Thou moldest Weisely breakest To trust is ours 'Tis Thine to understand{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Our Father Thy great love The cross hath told us We know not all Thy way But Thee we know Thou gav'st Thy Son No good will Thou withold us 'Tis love that lifts us up That lays us low{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Not in the boons Wherewith Thy good hand blesses We rest here or in Heaven Our home's Thy heart Yet here as there Wise love all power possesses And all Thou dost is love For love Thou art{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Not now Thy heart Its purpose for us reaches Another day is ours another place Now love's deep wisdom Disciplines and teaches Then Thou shalt rest And we see face to face{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All the vast course of Things love's plan is serving Day - night - life - death What men call good and ill With power untiring Purpose never swerving Thou workest out Thy good And perfect will{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All things are Thine All ours now and forever Complex Thy work But simple is Thy love Well known though passing Knowledge failing never O peace and joy And praise here and above{/lang-eng}
